text: The Dead Mac Scrolls is a 484-page do-it-yourself guide to repairing Apple Macintosh personal computer hardware problems in the most cost-effective way. Written by Larry Pina, the book was amongst other titles written by Pina for repairing Macintoshes. The book is out of print, and was first published in 1992. ==See also== * Larry Pina Category:1992 non-fiction books Category:Books by Larry Pina Category:Computer books
title: The Dead Mac Scrolls
